      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Color3D Scene3D.ambient
      this is the level and color of initial ambient light in the scene independent of the other lights in the scene
      Color3D Material.ambient 
      Color3D Light3D.ambient
      ambient, diffuse, and specular components of the light
      Color3D Scene3D.backgroundColor

      static Color3D RayTracer3D.computeColor(Ray3D r, Scene3D s, int depth)
      Compute the color of the pixel corresponding to the intersection of the ray r with the first object in the scene s
      Color3D Texture.getColor(TextureCoordinate tc)
      This returns a Color corresponding to the specified TextureCoordinates
      Color3D ImageTexture.getColor(TextureCoordinate tc)
      This returns a Color corresponding to the pixel whose location in the image is (x,y) after the image is normalized to have size 1.0 x 1.0
      Color3D CheckerTexture.getColor(TextureCoordinate tc)
      This returns a Color corresponding to the pixel whose location in the image is (x,y) where the checkerboard squares have size 100x100

      scale this color by d and return the newly created color
